original_text: “You shall be consecrated to me. Therefore you shall not eat any flesh that is torn by beasts in the field; you shall throw it to the dogs.
korean_text: 너희는 내게 거룩한 사람이 될지니 들에서 짐승에게 찢긴 동물의 고기를 먹지 말고 그것을 개에게 던질지니라

sentences.original_text: You shall be consecrated to me.
Therefore you shall not eat any flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희는 어떤 고기도 먹어서는 안 된다.

sentences.original_text: that is torn by beasts in the field
you shall throw it to the dogs.
